text.tspan: Artificial intelligence: Performance on knowledge tests vs. number of
Performance on knowledge tests is measured with the MMLU benchmark, here with 5-shot learning, which gauges a modelâ€™s
accuracy after receiving only five examples for each task. Parameters are variables in an AI system whose values are
adjusted during training to establish how input data gets transformed into the desired output; for example, the connection
weights in an artificial neural network.
Note: The values for the number of parameters are estimates and come with some uncertainty, especially for models for which only
